This Application requires permission to detect a phone call and send message if required. If the permission is not granted then the application will not work. So please consider above case and grant the upcoming permissions.

This is a simple and lite application which works on the concept of sending messages within a specified time span. The User has to establish a Task defining the Start Time & End Time with a Message Template. Once done with setup, the message will be sent in following cases - 
1. If User Rejects the Call. 
2. If the Incoming Call is not Answered(un-attended). 

Examples- 
College, Work, Swimming, Playing Sports, etc.
